What minerals are found in copper exploration projects?

Based on the context provided, copper exploration projects typically focus on the target commodities of copper and nickel. Specifically, the Wonganoo Project and the Duketon exploration projects mention both copper and nickel as the key minerals being targeted. If you have further questions or need more specific details, feel free to ask!
What can you tell me about Wonganoo Project

The Wonganoo Project focuses on nickel-copper exploration and includes various geological and geochemical activities such as soil sampling, geological mapping, geophysics, and ground magnetic surveys. The project emphasizes surface geochemistry and is targeting battery metals, specifically copper and nickel. This suggests that the project is aimed at identifying and assessing deposits of these valuable metals, which are important for various industrial applications, including electric vehicle batteries. If you have more specific questions about the project or related topics, feel free to ask!

What kinds of metals were the focus of this project?

The focus of the Wonganoo Project is on battery metals, specifically copper and nickel. These metals are targeted due to their importance in various industrial applications, including electric vehicle batteries. If you have more questions or need further information, feel free to ask!
